attributes.action: improve Moorthorpe Railway Station, West Yorkshire and all small stations with public consultation and design.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We (Moorthorpe Railway Station Public Lobby Group) and the people of South Elmsall, South Kirkby and Moorthorpe wish the Prime Minister to force the local and district councils to improve the facilities of small railway stations (such as Moorthorpe)by way of public debate and planning as a much used public space, not by the current closed door planning of a minority council to the detriment of the local services.
